Image.Alt: A group of people in BSA class A uniforms marching in the street. Towards the left, a scout is holding the US flag. To the right, a scout is holding the Troop 53 flag.
Image.Caption: The troop turning the corner at the intersection of Green Ave and Campbell Ave. Scoutmaster, Don McKnight, waves at the camera.

Image.Alt: A group of people in BSA class A uniforms marching in the street. One of whom is holding the US flag, and its blocking their face.
Image.Caption: Scoutmaster, Don Mcknight, leads the troop along the parade route. Scouts whose faces are visible are (left-to-right): John Dowling, Dusty Albertine, Jack Moulton, and Daniel Albertine.
